control-tag.name: server-data
control-tag.description: Location and login information for the server to access.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: The URL of the server to access.

attribute.name: server-name
attribute.description: The name of the server to access.

attribute.name: user-name
attribute.description: The username of a user who has administrative access to this server.

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: The password of a user who has administrative access to this server.
